EOD stands for “end of day.” It’s used to set a deadline for a task that should be complete by the end of the business day -- typically 5:00 PM. When no time zone is provided, end of day is relative to the sender’s time zone.

remarks:
COB stands for “close of business.” It refers to the end of a business day and the close of the financial markets in New York City, which define U.S. business hours. It’s used in business communications to set a deadline for a task to be completed by 5:00 PM Eastern Standard Time (EST).

全球事件管理。最高等级的安全问题，通过blackduck扫描出来的CVM问题最高等级的issue会被评为GEM issue，必须要在规定时间内修完，有以下等级：
L0: 2-14天
L1/L2：internet： 30/45天；intranet：45/60天

Open-Source GEM (OOS GEM)
OOS GEM findings are CVM findings that are highly prioritized due to high security risk posed by a 3rd party library version.
Hard gate: result in build failing for delayed remediation.
Action Owner: Application team
e.g. Apache Struts GEM
18 Dec Apache Struts GEM activation mail published
S&S and App team: Code analysis, Impact analysis
18-20 Dec: several rounds of meetings with GEM fusion, Cyber defense, senior ISO, VA team, senior App lead, S&S team
20 Dec Code deployment on UAT
21 Dec UTT testing
22 Dec prod deployment
The remediation timeline (effective even in freeze period):
• Level 0 - must be remediated in 2 - 14 days
• Level 1 / Level 2
• Internet - 30/45 days
• Intranet - 45/60 days

Infrastructure GEM
Scanned by Qualys/IVMP physically from servers. Issues include OS, server, middleware and application levels, e.g. windows patch delay,
IHS/WAS, AHS vulnerable version, SiteMinder vulnerabilities, Log4j 2.14.1 etc.
Action Owner: refer to VTM issues

Golden source : CVMP Portal
OOS GEM findings are CVM findings that are highly prioritized due to high security risk posed by a 3rd party library version.

漏洞威胁管理
Scanned by Qualys/IVMP physically from servers. Issues include OS, server, middleware and application levels.
Dashboard: CVMP portal - Cognos
Issue types and owners:
• Server: IHS/WAS/AHS/Tomcat/weblogic/ IBM MQ/jBPM
• Action owner:
For CG - CPC:
• IHS/WAS/AHS/weblogic: for Prod or UAT, if servers in Global patching farm, owner is Global patching team; otherwise server is under deployment, owner is build middleware team. For dev servers, if servers not in GPT farm, owner is application team.
• Tomcat: For non-embedded Tomcat, same case as above. For Embedded Tomcat, sector support (data middleware team & Application team)
• IBM MQ: Data middleware team / Application team
• JBPM: Jackson
For CPB: Application team
• Agents: McAfee/Veritas Netbackup/evolven/AppD/Autosys/CAS/MST agents
• Action owner:
• McAfee/Veritas Netbackup : SA or Wintel team
Evolven/AppD: Evovlen /AppD team
• Autosys/CAS/MST agents : Application teams
• Application: Jquery/Obsolete java/Mysql/PHP/log4j/Spring/Plan text Basic Authentication etc
• Action owner: Application team

纳税人识别号 (TIN) 可向政府机构识别个人或实体，以便进行税务申报和财务追踪。由于这些代码将您的记录直接与美国国税局 (IRS) 关联，官员可以更轻松地确认每份申报表或报表是否与正确的账户相符。通过分配唯一的标识符，当局可以减少错误并简化监管。

在大多数情况下，IRS 会颁发 TIN，以保持个人和企业数据的井然有序。此流程有助于确保每个人（从小型企业到大型企业）的信息清晰，并避免在验证合规性或申报税款时产生混淆。尽管 TIN 的形式多种多样，但它们都服务于同一个基本目标：确保在美国税务体系内进行一致、准确的识别。

雇主识别号 (EIN) 专用于企业而非个人，但它仍然属于更广泛的纳税人识别号 (TIN) 类别。EIN 与其他标识符的主要区别在于，EIN 将工资单和财务信息直接关联到企业，而不是个人纳税人。换句话说，您的社会安全号码 (SSN) 可能报告个人收入，而 EIN 记录的是公司交易和债务。这种区别解答了诸如“EIN 和 TIN 是否相同”之类的问题，强调 EIN 是 TIN 的一个专门用于企业和工资单用途的子集，并非适用于所有纳税人的通用解决方案。
社会安全号码 (SSN) 是由美国政府向美国公民颁发的九位数字，用于纳税和记录保存。SSN 由美国政府的独立机构社会保障局 (SSA) 颁发给个人。
社会保障局 (SSA) 是美国政府的一个机构，负责管理涵盖残疾、退休和遗属福利等社会项目。

手动接触点是指流程或系统中需要人工干预的点，例如手动数据录入、文书工作或物理操作。此处的风险控制涉及降低与这些手动接触点相关的风险（例如人为错误、效率低下和安全漏洞）的策略和措施。
